name: NARNIA inspired Perfume Sampler Set
description:
The three sample bottles contain 1.5ml of perfume each, which is enough for about 10-14 applications. You will receive your perfumes lovingly wrapped with tissue paper.

GENTLE QUEEN - Practical and motherly, yet deadly with a bow, the Gentle Queen rules the magical kingdom with grace and beauty. Her scent is a floral blend starting with the popular blooms of her homeland - english lavender and roses. Exotic plumeria and a bit of chypre adds a touch of sophistication and romance. Top notes of several fruits complete her regal fragrance. This captivating floral scent is inspired by the character of Susan from the Chronicles of Narnia novels!

Main notes: plumeria, english lavender, english rose, fruits, lemon, chypre

KNIGHT OF ASLAN - The Knight of Aslan has a jealous and sarcastic nature, and yet after many trials he learned to become a just and noble ruler. Always ready to ride into battle in times of need, rely on the Knight of Aslan to protect you. His scent starts with sugared Turkish Delight candy, and after a few moments a hint of English lavender and leather armour is apparent. Citrus blooms and masculine sandalwood top off this magical blend of darkness and light. This unique unisex scent is inspired by the character of Edmund from the Chronicles of Narnia novels!

Main notes: leather accord, citrus, lavender, sandalwood, candy

VALIANT HEART - The most faithful and loving of the Kings and Queens, the Valiant Heart is both healer and mighty warrior. The battle is always won with her at your side. Her scent is a mixture of English lavender and plumeria with the palest of musks. Fruit with vanilla cake and almonds are blended with the florals, bringing a hint of sweetness and child-like merriment to the fragrance. Finally, a light dusting of Turkish Delight candy tops the blend. This sweet and enchanting floral is inspired by the character of Lucy from the Chronicles of Narnia novels!

Main notes: plumeria, citrus, lavender, English apples, almond cake

Sarawen perfume oils are:

- Cruelty-free and 100% vegan (any scents with notes of honey, leather, or musk are either synthetic or derived from plant-based sources).

- Hand-blended from natural and synthetic sources, in a base of rice bran and fractionated coconut oil, with vitamin E as a natural preservative.

- No alcohol, parabens, or phthalates

Perfume oils have been used for centuries by both ladies and gentlemen, and are the ideal alternative to harsh, modern, preservative-laden formulas.

---- SHIPPING:

To US and Overseas - Typical arrival time is 4-10 business days via Canada Post Light Packet. No tracking or insurance. Message me if you wish to upgrade to Expedited or Expresspost.

Elf Queen - One of the mightiest and fairest of the elves, the Elf Queen is surrounded by night-blooming jasmine flowers and the sweet smells of warm honey and golden vanilla cream. Rich incense swirls in the air as she rules her woodland kingdom. A rich, unique floriental fragrance inspired by the character of Galadriel from Tolkien's Lord of the Rings. Main notes: jasmine, vanilla, dragonsblood, honey, chypre

THE GOLDEN WOODS - An elven warden in the woods protects his magical kingdom with agile strength and keen perception. As he strolls through the Golden Wood, he catches the scent of fresh, lively lemongrass blended with vetiver, cedar, and last evening's blossoming of midnight jasmine. An aromatic hint of the morning's sweetbread from the ovens wafts by, bringing a smile to his fair features. This woodsy-floral blend is inspired by the character Haldir from Lord of the Rings.

name: DRACULA Perfume Oil - Musk, Nag Champa, Wine
description:
DRACULA

"The last I saw of Count Dracula was his kissing his hand to me; with a red light of triumph in his eyes, and with a smile that Judas in hell might be proud of." - Dracula, Bram Stoker

He rises from the crypt - tall and slender with a cruel but alluring handsomeness that only the Undead can possess. A sweet musky fragrance of honeyed wine and exotic nag champa emanates around him, mixing with the scent of wet earth from the cemetary. A slight trace of Mina Harker's perfume lingers in the air as he moves.

Dracula is a fragrance that's created for the discerning undead gentleman, but ladies hungering for the Count may also wear this Gothic fragrance. You've been warned!

Main notes: musk, red wine, light patchouli, nag champa, dragonsblood, honey

name: VAMPIRE'S EMBRACE Perfume Oil Sampler Set
description:
You will receive eight 1.5ml samples of my vampire -inspired scents! Each bottle is enough for about 10-14 applications.

AKKASHA - Crushed white jasmine flowers and blood-red roses strewn around her tomb, the faint scent of her musk blanketing and alluring all who look upon her. A sultry floral blend, this scent is inspired by the Vampire Queen of Legend! Main notes: night jasmine, rose, chypre, musk

DRACULA - He rises from the crypt - tall and slender with a cruel but alluring handsomeness that only the Undead can possess. A sweet musky fragrance of honeyed wine and exotic nag champa emanates around him, mixing with the scent of wet earth from the cemetary. A slight trace of Mina Harker's perfume lingers in the air as he moves. Dracula is a fragrance that's created for the discerning undead gentleman, but ladies hungering for the Count may also wear this Gothic fragrance. You've been warned! Main notes: musk, red wine, light patchouli, nag champa, dragonsblood, honey

HUNTER: It is time. I have prepared my mind and body, and studied your strengths and weaknesses. I shrug on my leathers and adjust my belts: a mix of dragon’s blood and myrrh can be noted - ingredients for my salves and liquid weapons. Lastly, I pick up my crossbow with its rosewood finished handle and crank the string taut. The Count awaits my arrival. Hunter is a unisex fragrance that borders towards masculine and is inspired by the character of Van Helsing from Bram Stoker's Dracula. Main notes: leather, myrrh, rosewood, musk, ylang ylang

MIDNIGHT KISS - A forbidden kiss at midnight tasting of honeyed red ripe fruits while the air is scented with hints of roses and musk. An alluring, feminine, yet bold fragrance with red fruits, roses, and dragon's blood. A word of warning: you may be devoured by handsome vampires when wearing this perfume! Main notes: red berry, pomegranate, rose, musk, incense

MINA - The freshest blooming rose, cut down and corrupted with the taste of sinful depravity and wickedness. A seductive scent flushed with decayed roses, notes of myrrh, musk, dragon's blood, and dark temptations! Be on your guard when wearing this scent, lest you be spirited away by a handsome demon. Main notes: musk, rose accord, rosewood, myrrh, dragonsblood

UNDYING - Romantic eastern flowers of heavenly champaka and ylang ylang create the base of this rich, smokey fragrance. Vanilla-infused musk and a touch of decayed honeyed figs completes this exotic blend that's inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's Gothic short story, "Ligeia"! Main notes: champaka, musk, honey, vanilla, fig

VAMPIRE BRIDE - Dried honeysuckle blossoms mingled with exotic musk and sweet honey. A touch of decayed figs rounds out the top note of this fragrance that only a true vampire bride could wear! This feminine but dangerous scent is inspired by the character of Lucy Westenra from Bram Stoker's novel. Main notes: honeysuckle, honey, musk, ylang ylang

VAMPIRE PRINCESS - Withered snow-white jasmine and ylang-ylang flowers layered over rich honey, a whiff of musk and darkness creeping beneath. A hypnotic and sweet floral scent perfect for a fanged princess! Main notes: honey, jasmine, musk

name: SHALIMAR KNIGHT Perfume Oil
description:
SHALIMAR KNIGHT

"To generalize on women is dangerous. To specialize on them is infinitely worse.” - Rudolph Valentino

Inspired by 1920’s actor Rudolph Valentino, this classy-smooth scent combines his European sophistication and smoldering personality. Crisp juniper and bergamot blend with honeyed musk, black pepper, fresh oranges, and sultry ylang ylang. A light dusting of tobacco and Eastern oud adds richness and depth to this seductive fragrance. Although created for gents, Shalimar Knight is a balanced unisex scent that modern flapper girls can also wear.

Main notes: juniper, musk, bergamot, pepper, tobacco, oud

GATSBY Perfume Sampler Set

You will receive three 1.5ml samples of my Gatsby -inspired scents! Each bottle is enough for about 10-14 applications.

JADED AMBITION - He lights his expensive cigar, watching the party descend until dawn. The enigmatic Mr. Gatsby seems to have many secrets. Sidling up beside him, he gives you a friendly grin and you catch the aroma of his sweet cigar, exotic woods, citrus, and little hint of Daisy's orchid perfume. For only one woman can truly hold his heart.  Main notes: tobacco, citrus accord, oud, coffee, orchid, benzoin

This scent is inspired by the character of Jay Gatsy from F. Scott Fitzgerald's American masterpiece, and is unisex bordering to masculine fragrance.

JADED DECADENCE - She's the ultimate party girl. She is youth, beauty, and decadence personified. Her athletic figure dances to the latest rage - jazz music. And soon you note the scent of violets, rose, and a hint of cream vanilla and sweet red wine. She flashes a smile and the young men sigh.

Main notes: violets, vanilla, rose, chypre, citrus accord, merlot wine

This scent is inspired by the character of Jordan Baker from F. Scott Fitzgerald's American masterpiece, and is a floriental -style scent for modern flappers!

JADED INNOCENCE - Distant yet so close. Cold, but still yearning for a past love. Her soft eyes twinkle, and the scent of orchids, cream, honey, and violets fill the sense. She speaks, and the warm timbre of her voice can still make Gatsby weaken at the knees.

Main notes: orchid, champagne, honey, citrus accord, chypre

This scent is inspired by the character of Daisy Buchanan from F. Scott Fitzgerald's American masterpiece, and is a soft floriental scent for modern flappers!

name: THE WITCHES DANCE Perfume Oil Halloween - Robert Burns inspired
description:
THE WITCHES DANCE

"And, wow! Tam saw an unco sight!
Warlocks and witches in a dance
Nae cotillion, brent new frae France
But hornpipes, jigs, strathspeys, and reels
Put life and mettle in their heels
A winnock-bunker in the east
There sat auld Nick, in shape o' beast
A towzie tyke, black, grim, and large
To gie them music was his charge
He screw'd the pipes and gart them skirl
Till roof and rafters a' did dirl
Coffins stood round, like open presses
That shaw'd the dead in their last dresses
And by some devilish cantraip slight .. " - Robert Burns

name: MIDDLE EARTH inspired Perfume Sampler Set
description:
PERFUMES INSPIRED BY LORD OF THE RINGS

You will receive nine 1.5ml samples of my Lord of the Rings- inspired scents! Each bottle is enough for about 10-14 applications. 

THE GOLDEN WOODS - An elven warden in the woods protects his magical kingdom with agile strength and keen perception. As he strolls through the Golden Wood, he catches the scent of fresh, lively lemongrass blended with vetiver, cedar, and last evening's blossoming of midnight jasmine. An aromatic hint of the morning's sweetbread from the ovens wafts by, bringing a smile to his fair features. This woodsy-floral blend is inspired by the character Haldir from Lord of the Rings. A balanced unisex scent, it's perfect for all elven lads and lasses!

ELF KING - A towering elven warrior, he stands ready with spear and shield to defend his woodland home against Sauron's malice! Bright bergamot blends with eastern musk, ivy greens and woods, leather, with a touch of sweet benzoin. This masculine, classic scent is inspired by King Thranduil and all the elves of the Greenwood. Although created for gentlemen, a refined elven lady could easily wear this fragrance!

ELF PRINCESS- She dances merrily through a meadow of lavender and wild roses, her long dark hair smelling faintly of sandalwood as the wind brushes through her fair form. A blend of of lavender, roses, and sandalwood - a pretty floral scent, reminiscent of a medieval garden. Fragrance was inspired by Tolkien's beautiful elf characters Luthien and Arwen. Main notes: lavender, geranium rose, rose, lily

ELF QUEEN: One of the mightiest and fairest of the elves, the Elf Queen is surrounded by night-blooming jasmine flowers and the sweet smells of warm honey and golden vanilla cream. Rich incense swirls in the air as she rules her woodland kingdom. A rich, unique floriental fragrance inspired by the character of Galadriel from Tolkien's Lord of the Rings. Main notes: jasmine, vanilla, dragonsblood, honey, chypre

GREENLEAF - On the words of my father I travel. Through cedarwood forest and across lemongrass fields I make my way to the Council. Darkness comes and the races must converse or fall. I stop along a riverbank; jasmine and rosemary flow through the air and relaxes my mind. I mustn’t tarry - I take hold of my reins that leave traces of sandalwood upon my hands and carry on to The Hidden Valley to begin my fateful journey. Greenleaf is a fresh woods-citrus scent with hints of floral and herbs. Created for gentlemen, but elven ladies can also wear this fresh, classic blend! 

IVORY TOWERS - Long is the gaze from the Ivory Towers. The King drinks from a spiced honey beverage as a swirl of orange blossoms and bergamot leaves dance outside the window, carried on high by the wind. The scent of sun-baked marble and floral blooms wafts inside the throne room. A balanced unisex fragrance inspired by the kingdom of Gondor. Main notes: honey, orange blossom, bergamot, black peper, citrus

MISTY JOURNEYS - Sweet tobacco, ivy greens, and tilled earth are the base for this unique scent that evokes the comfort of home with the longing for a grand adventure! A hint of butterscotch and honeyed tea tops off this unique fragrance inspired by the characters of Bilbo and Frodo Baggins from JRR Tolkien's "The Hobbit". A balanced unisex fragrance, good for all hobbit lads and lasses!

MOUNTAIN HALLS - Forged in the flames of a hearth, a dwarven smith lays the final touches upon a weapon that will soon taste dragon blood. A pipe is lit to celebrate the fine craftsmanship as the scents bring comfort and strength to the clan in the Mountain Halls. A unisex fragrance that borders to masculine and inspired by the majesty of the dwarves. Main notes: dragonsblood incense, tobacco, copal, bay rum, cedar

SHIELDMAIDEN - "If you can not wield a sword as well as a spade, you will not be long for this life." It is a harsh world and for that the Shieldmaiden must be strong. Leather protects her form, even as the scent of ivy and lilies upon her shows that femininity is not just for pampered princesses! A fresh floral scent with a background of leather inspired by Eowyn. Main notes: lilies, leather, geranium rose, ivy, cypress

description:

" ... for Legolas was fair of face beyond the measure of Men, and he sang an elven-song in a clear voice as he walked in the morning ..."
- Return of the King, J.R.R. Tolkien

On the words of my father I travel. Through cedarwood forest and across lemongrass fields I make my way to the Council. Darkness comes and the races must converse or fall. I stop along a riverbank; jasmine and rosemary flow through the air and relaxes my mind. I mustn’t tarry - I take hold of my reins that leave traces of sandalwood upon my hands and carry on to The Hidden Valley to my begin fateful journey.
